data.eml:eml: Two new species of the Empis subgenus Lissempis (Diptera: Empididae) from the Caucasus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Shamshev, Igor, Kustov, Semen (2013): Two new species of the Empis subgenus Lissempis (Diptera: Empididae) from the Caucasus. Zootaxa 3637 (1), DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3637.1.8
